product_name: Rainbow of California Medium Knife Case
long_description: This padded nylon sheath with hook-and-loop closure fits smaller Swiss Army knives and other pocket knives. Features 2-3/4" loop for attaching to your belt. Fits the Swiss Army Classic, Climber, Recruit and Tinker knives. Can be worn either horizontally or vertically.
short_description: This padded nylon sheath with hook-and-loop closure fits smaller Swiss Army knives and other pocket knives.
